title: LF Duo Partner - Silv/Gold
body:
Yo, I'm 19 years old.
Finished S5 with a Silv1 and Gold 5.

I am keen to find someone a similar age who is not really aggro and overly-serious.
I am quite calm, I have a really mellow personality and I do not like raging or negativity in communication. I am really open to constructive criticism as I see LoL skill as a craft and I enjoy developing my abilities. If you can laugh about the misplays and opening admit to fucking up then we'll get along well.

I haven't really mained a lane. I duo'd my Gold 5 placements with my high plat roomate. We alternated playing mid/top and won 9/10. My silver has been going since s3 and I played from B4 to S1 in a month, just filled any position. Then I started Uni and never touched LoL for months. If I find a decent duo partner I want to grow in my consistency with Top and Jungle. I can play each role efficiently to a high Silver standard but I'd say I'm most comfortable with Jungle.

I'm a bit irregular with playing the game, i'd go hard for a couple months then focus on shit IRL for a bit. But I'm keen to knuckle down for S6 as I want platinum by March.

I'm just after someone a similar age, who is fun and can laugh about shit. It would be great for someone of a high skill level to touch me up in some areas. I'm quite consistent and understand most the ground foundation of gameplay.

Skype: jordan.whore
IGN: Manawa

replies.body: Yo im lookin for an adc to start ranking with since im unranked.  get if ur lookin for someone whos actually ranked but i 100% feel on the whole personality so add me on skype: rezendebae3 or ig: rezendebae if youre still down to see
